root.Summary: 1: Li X, Han J, Zhao Y, Ding W, Wei J, Han S, Shang X, Wang B, Chen B, Xiao Z,Dai J. Functionalized Collagen Scaffold Neutralizing the Myelin-InhibitoryMolecules Promoted Neurites Outgrowth in Vitro and Facilitated Spinal CordRegeneration in Vivo.
